reviewText: This seems to be a basic how-to, with practically no assistance the the Nuvi's more advanced features. And THEN the last HALF of the DVD is about FISHING DVDs the company sells! This item should be provided for free. The Nuvi is an excellent GPS, so I'm still glad I bought it, but avoid this DVD. Garmin nvi 680 4.3-Inch Bluetooth Portable GPS Navigator
